DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Non-Pneumatic Anti-Shock Garment ( NASG ) Egypt
DOC.detailed_description: This comparative , pre-post study Non-pneumatic Anti-Shock Garment ( NASG ) establish effectiveness reduce maternal mortality morbidity due obstetrical hemorrhage . The site two maternity teach hospital Egypt : El Galaa , Cairo Assiut University Assiut . Our main aim test efficacy NASG woman suffer obstetric hemorrhage compare hemorrhaging woman receive NASG . Our primary outcome Extreme Adverse Outcomes ( EAO ) - combine outcome maternal mortality severe morbidity . Secondary outcome include mean measure blood loss incidence emergency hysterectomy .
